SEARCH
Package BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class AgentBESA

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.AgentBESA
Direct Known Subclasses:
PeriodicAgentBESA, ServiceProviderBESA
public abstract class AgentBESA extends Object
This class represents an agent in the platform BESA. An agent consists of a concurrent behaviors group, that has associate guards as well. In order to construct new agents it is necessary to create a class that extends of AgentBESA.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana

  • Field Details

    • state

      protected StateBESA state
      Internal state of the BESA agent.

  • Constructor Details

    • AgentBESA

      public AgentBESA(String alias, StateBESA state, StructBESA structAgent, double passwd) throws KernelAgentExceptionBESA
      Builds a BESA agent. In order to construct an agent BESA is necessary to provide a structure that contains the associations between behaviors, guards and multiguards, in addition to a state in where the internal states of the agent are stored.
      Parameters:
      alias - Name of the agent with whom it will be identified in the BESA container.
      state - Internal state of the agent, which inherits of StateBESA.
      structAgent - Structure that indicates the associations between guards, multiguards and behaviors.
      passwd - Password necessary to access to the agent.
      Throws:
      KernelAgentExceptionBESA

  • Method Details

    • saveAgent

      public void saveAgent()
      Guarda el estado del Agente completo

    • start

      public void start()
      This method starts the agent behavior. TODO Verificar las excepciones.

    • sendEvent

      public void sendEvent(EventBESA ev) throws KernelAgentExceptionBESA
      Sends an event to an agent. This method doesn't have to be invoked by the user, only must be called by the container to do the events treatment.

      EventBESA contains a field to add the sender, which must be filled in explicit form by the programmer. TODO Verificar seguridad.
      Parameters:
      ev - Event that is deposited in the mailbox.

    • setupAgent

      public abstract void setupAgent()
      Starting routine of the agent. Invoked automatically before the infinite cycle. To consider when implementing this method: - The state was initialized previously in the constructor of the agent. - Create the guards (automatic bind). - Create the behaviors (automatic registry). - Register agent services. It must be implemented by the user to create an agent.

    • shutdownAgent

      public abstract void shutdownAgent()
      Closing routine of the agent. In this resources are freed and behaviors are stopped. It is invoked automatically when leaving the infinite cycle. It must be provided by the user.

    • getAid

      public final String getAid()
      Returns the aid that identifies of unique way the agent in the container.
      Returns:
      String that identifies of unique way the agent between the BESA containers.

    • getAlias

      public final String getAlias()
      Obtains the alias of the agent.
      Returns:
      Alias of the agent.

    • getState

      public StateBESA getState()
      Returns the agent internal state.
      Returns:
      Internal state of the agent, which inherits of StateBESA.

    • resetAlive

      public void resetAlive()
      Method used for synchronization in mobility tasks.

      It doesn't have to be called by the user.

    • move

      public final void move(double passwd) throws KernelAgentExceptionBESA
      Invoked routine to stop an agent and move it.It doesn't have to be called directly by the user, to move an agent, this method must be invoked from AdmBESA.
      Parameters:
      passwd - Password of the agent.
      Throws:
      KernelAgentExceptionBESA

    • startBehaviors

      protected final int startBehaviors() throws KernelAgentExceptionBESA
      Starts all the behaviors associated to an agent.
      Returns:
      The number of behaviors initialized.
      Throws:
      KernelAgentExceptionBESA

    • killBehaviors

      protected final void killBehaviors(double passwd) throws KernelAgentExceptionBESA
      Finalizes all the behaviors associated to an agent.
      Parameters:
      passwd - Password of the agent.
      Throws:
      KernelAgentExceptionBESA

    • joinBehaviors

      public final void joinBehaviors(double passwd) throws KernelAgentExceptionBESA
      Synchronizes the death of threads of the behaviors associates.
      Parameters:
      passwd - Password of the agent.
      Throws:
      KernelAgentExceptionBESA

    • bindGuard

      protected final PortBESA bindGuard(GuardBESA guard)
      Registers the associated port to a guard. Establishing a port associated with the guard. Validates that has not been created a port for guard event.
      Parameters:
      guard - Guard to being registered in the agent.
      Returns:
      Port associated to the guard for this agent. Returns null if there was already a port for the same event type

    • unbindGuard

      public final boolean unbindGuard(GuardBESA guard)
      Eliminates the associated port to a guard.
      Parameters:
      guard - Guard to being unregistered in the agent.
      Returns:
      true if the guard has been eliminated; false otherwise.

    • registerBehavior

      public final void registerBehavior(BehaviorBESA beh)
      Registers a behavior. The behavior is including in a vector and the repetitions are avoided. This list of behaviors is useful for the accomplishment of collective synchronizations. Also it is used to kill automatically the behaviors associated to an agent when this dies.
      Parameters:
      beh - Behavior to register.

    • registerGuard

      public final GuardBESA registerGuard(BehaviorBESA beh, String evType)
      Associates a behavior to a guard that handles a type of event. It's called internally by AgentBESA and it does not have to be invoked directly .
      Parameters:
      beh - Behavior to register.
      evType - Type of event that corresponds to the name of the class guard.
      Returns:
      Created GuardBESA.

    • isAlive

      public final Boolean isAlive()
      Indicates if the agent is alive or not.
      Returns:
      true if the agent is alive ; false otherwise.

    • getChannel

      public final ChannelBESA getChannel()
      Obtains the BESA channel associate to the agent.
      Returns:
      ChannelBESA associated to the agent.
